text: :Pages appear in :Category:American scientists This is a list of American scientists. *Benjamin Franklin (d. 1790), President of Pennsylvania *Thomas Edison (d. 1931) \- he and his workers made "the first practical incandescent light bulb"; *Nikola Tesla (d. 1943), Serbian-American, best known for his contributions to the design of the modern alternating current (AC) electricity supply system; electrical engineer, mechanical engineer *Ferid Murad (b. 1936) - he has a Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine ==Related pages== *List of scientists from North America ==Sources== * America scientist
title: List of American scientists
